name: Buck

text: wa<in m~in $aYo'K <il~aA EindanaA xazaA^}inuhu, wamaA nunaz~iluhu,^ <il~aA biqadarK m~aEoluwmK

text: wa>arosalonaA {lr~iya`Ha lawa`qiHa fa>anzalonaA mina {ls~amaA^'i maA^'F fa>asoqayona`kumuwhu wamaA^ >antumo lahu, bixa`ziniyna

text: wa<in~a rab~aka huwa yaHo$uruhumo <in~ahu, HakiymN EaliymN
